data.title: SPONSORS AND PARTNERS
data.text:
Official kit supplier to the Scotland team

Macron is an Italian Company based in Bologna and remains the European leader in the production of a unique and tailor-made active sportswear. Founded in 1971, the company initially produced sportswear for major Italian and international brands.

In 1997, Macron began developing its own label and taking on the conception, design, prototyping and marketing of hi-tech apparel for football, basketball, volleyball and baseball for amateur and professional clubs around the world. Now Macron operates in three main business areas:

Teamwear: apparel and accessories for professional and amateur teams (rugby, football, basketball, volleyball, baseball, handball, five a side football, running).

Merchandising: official team kits, free time apparel and accessories for the supporters of Macron’s Sponsored Clubs.

Leisurewear: sports inspired apparel for those who want to wear Macron off the field.

Macron owes its success to the quality of the products, the high standard of service and to the ability of best interpreting the athletes technical and physical needs.

www.macron.com

Founded in 1954, the fledgling business took off from a single-car showroom on Glasgow’s Park Road, given flight by its founder’s simple philosophy: to offer genuine value for money and customer service of the highest level.

Fast forward 70 years, and the company continues to flourish; with 200 branches across the country and selling over 200,000 cars a year. But while Arnold Clark is a name that’s synonymous with vehicle sales, there’s much more to the business than you see on the showroom floor.

There’s also a vehicle rental and fleet management division, with its very own film and TV division, and a fleet of over 50,000 cars. The Group also offers everything that a customer might need for the onward journey, with parts and servicing departments, an accident repairs division, and insurance services.

Arnold Clark are proud to be the Official Principal Partner and Men’s Front of Shirt Partner.

Saltire Energy is the leading specialist in oilfield equipment rental to the global energy sector. Founded by Mike Loggie in 1986 and head-quartered in Aberdeen, continuous investment in state-of-the-art facilities and innovative product lines has seen the company grow to service worldwide operations for global operators.

As an official partner of Scottish Rugby, Saltire Energy’s story and journey mirror those of many of the young, aspiring people who take part in the Scottish Rugby youth programmes and initiatives. Saltire Energy takes huge pride in supporting Scottish Rugby, whose core values of respect, leadership, achievement, engagement and enjoyment are fundamental to all that it stands for.

Destination Sport are a leading travel provider, covering team and business travel for some of the world’s leading sporting organisations, as well as their supporter travel packages, delivered by their consumer arm, Sportsbreaks.com.

Following considerable expansion via organic growth and acquisitions, Destination Sport Group became a standalone division within the Portman Travel Group in 2021. Making a global footprint across 14 countries within the UK and Europe, North America, Middle East, China and Australia.

Offering partners and clients a best-in-class solution via their seven market leading divisions: Amaze, Destination Sport Experiences, Destination Sport Travel, InspireSport, Mike Burton Group, Sportsbreaks.com and Sportsworld.

Destination Sport is here to take you further by setting the global standard in sports travel and to give you what you need to succeed.

Official supplier of personal grooming products to Scottish Rugby

Dove Men+Care is proud to be an official partner of Scottish Rugby, and has supplied the union and players with personal grooming products since the start of the 2012/13 season.

The level of preparation required by the players should be reflected in their daily routines. Dove Men+Care is a range of anti-perspirant deodorants, shower gels and face care products, specially formulated for men to deliver high performance and superior skin care.

Dove Men+Care looks forward to celebrating and sharing in the passion of Scottish rugby and its fans.

www.dove.com/uk/men-care

Official Dentist and Mouthguard Provider of Scottish Rugby and Edinburgh Rugby

Smile Plus, newly formed in 2007 and again in 2023 by Clyde Munro Dental Care, who celebrate their 80th Practice acquisition.

The practice endeavour to achieve creating a calm, contemporary setting for the delivery of a modern mix of treatments to help make the very best of your smile.

At SmilePlus Dental Care & Implant Centre, they offer a wide range of private cosmetic treatments including short-term orthodontics, smile design, teeth whitening, veneers, and crown and bridge work.

Their dentists have years of experience covering all aspects of general, cosmetic and implant dentistry (including CHROME Guided SMILE) plus facial aesthetic treatments, with a proven track record of exceptional care.

Smile Plus are big sports fans and are proud to be Official Dentists to the Scotland Rugby team, as well as expert producers of custom-made mouthguards in their own on-site laboratory. They also provide dental care for international athletes and boxers and have provided mouthguards for many Olympians and Commonwealth Games athletes over the years.

Official Healthcare Partner of Scottish Rugby

Spire Edinburgh Hospitals are proud to be the Official Healthcare Partner for both Scotland and Edinburgh rugby, working in partnership with over 270 experienced consultants they provide the country’s top rugby players with outpatient consultations, imaging, and surgical treatments. They are the leading private healthcare provider in Edinburgh and the East of Scotland. Continually investing in their people and the latest technologies, last year they treated over 36,000 patients.

Hospital director of Spire Edinburgh Hospitals Ken Hay added: “Providing healthcare to the country’s elite sportsmen is a real privilege. Our approach to their care is exactly the same as we offer to all our patients – exceptional surgeons, caring nursing staff and pioneering technology”.

www.spirehealthcare.com/edinburgh

Official beer of Scottish Rugby

Tennent’s Lager has been a long-standing supporter of Scottish sport, music and culture and been involved with Scottish Rugby for many years now. Tennent’s Lager will be backing the team throughout the Guinness Six Nations Championship and the Autumn Nations Series at the Tennent’s Lager Up and Under Bar at Scottish Gas Murrayfield. We will also be enhancing the match day experience for fans in and around the stadium and across social media.

On arrival at Scottish Gas Murrayfield, head straight for the Tennent’s Lager Up & Under bar, located on the first floor, in the south west of the stadium, serving pints of Tennent’s Lager, Caledonia Best and Magners Cider, as well as a range of non-alcoholic drinks. Here you will be welcomed to soak up the pre match atmosphere with entertainment that includes live music from house band The Caledonians and a Q&A session with current Scotland player(s).

www.tennents.com

Skyscanner is a global leader in travel helping travellers plan and book their trip with ease and confidence.

Every month Skyscanner connects with millions of travellers in 52 countries and 32 languages to more than 1200 trusted travel partners so they can find the best flight, hotel or car hire options.

Over a million UK consumers voted Skyscanner the best travel site for price comparison at the British Travel Awards 2023. Making use of the latest technology,

Skyscanner simplifies the complexity of travel and provides honest and transparent solutions, searching more than 80 billion prices every day so travellers can be sure they’ve seen the best possible options, all in one place.

Founded in 2003, Skyscanner has offices worldwide, in Europe, Asia-Pacific and North America where traveller-first innovations are developed, powered by data and insights. Skyscanner is committed to helping shape a more responsible future for travel in collaboration with our partners, so that every traveller can explore our world effortlessly for generations to come.
